metadata.title: CVE-2018-9206 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - high
metadata.description:
Unauthenticated arbitrary file upload vulnerability in BlueimpjQuery-File-Upload <= v9.22.0

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-9206` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjs-jquery-file-upload - 9.19.1-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libjs-jquery-file-upload package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '9.19.1-1ubuntu0.1').
